COMMAND.NAME: getbuffervariable
COMMAND.SUMMARY: Get a variable associated with a buffer
COMMAND.PARAMETER: bufferNameThe unique name of an e93 buffer.
COMMAND.DESCRIPTION: Get the text of variableName contained in bufferName . If no such variable exists, an error is returned.
COMMAND.STATUS:
This command will return an error in the following cases:
bufferName is not provided.
bufferName is not an e93 buffer.
